sentences.sContent: I knew right away that I was pregnant.
I thought I was too old to get pregnant .
sentences.sCn: 我觉得自己年龄太大，已经不能怀孕了。

sentences.sContent: I didn’t mean to get her pregnant (= make her pregnant ) .
His wife was heavily pregnant (= almost ready to give birth ) .
Every phrase in this poem is pregnant with meaning.
sentences.sCn: 这首诗的片言只语都充满深意。

remMethod.val: pre(…前)+gn(生产)+ant→生产前的状况→怀孕的

words.tran: 怀孕；丰富，多产；意义深长

trans.tranOther: if a woman or female animal is pregnant, she has an unborn baby growing inside her body
